project.description: This job will take a dbgap previous version for any study type and move it back into the correct folder

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: participant_set
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Participant set being archived. If applicable.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 1800 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 mv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/oldData/${study_accession,,}/${version}.${participant_set}/rawData/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/rawData/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "${study_accession,,}*"
aws s3 mv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/oldData/${study_accession,,}/${version}.${participant_set}/decoded_data/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/decoded_data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "${study_accession,,}*"
aws s3 mv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/oldData/${study_accession,,}/${version}.${participant_set}/completed/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${study_abv_name,,}/completed/${study_accession,,}/ --recursive
